title: So what you're saying is...
body:
That you're a kid and yet also a squid?

{{champion:117}}

replies.body:
That Zac in the background...
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/entries/icons/facebook/000/006/077/so_good.png
lost a lot of weight. Or is that him they are swimming in?
He just lost himself while swimming.
He's happy about his new skin.
WILL THE SPLATOON JOKES OF THIS SKIN NEVER END?!
I really hope not.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QwKP7qHH,comment-id=00050002,timestamp=2015-06-29T16:37:06.588+0000)
>
> I really hope not.

Is that who i think it is?

Also first post and first riot response.
I basically went and bought Splatoon because of PP Lulu >.>

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=QwKP7qHH,comment-id=00050002,timestamp=2015-06-29T16:37:06.588+0000)
>
> I really hope not.

DON'T WORRY, I HAVE A PHD IN SQUID JOKES AND I COME FROM /R/SPLATOON, IT WILL BE FINE
no. never.
I honestly bought the skin just for the jokes.

so... youre saying lulu is a sk(u)id
{{champion:119}}

Not the first time a Splatoon ref has been made...and it won't be the last.

*snerk*  Imagine her Hugifying a teammate in Turf Wars on Splatoon...a teammate with a Roller weapon...or with the Kraken ability.  *grins so evilly, the Joker feels his shtick is being stolen*
good one
I would not swim in that water.
a kid or a squid?

I think this meme was already made ._.

+1 for Zac doe.
splatoon plz
